parameters.name: allowedAbbreviationLength
parameters.description:
Indicate the number of consecutive capital letters allowed in targeted
             identifiers (abbreviations in the classes, interfaces, variables and methods
             names, ... ).

parameters.name: allowedAbbreviations
parameters.description:
Specify list of abbreviations that must be skipped for checking.
            Abbreviations should be separated by comma.

parameters.name: ignoreFinal
parameters.description: Allow to skip variables with final modifier.

parameters.name: ignoreOverriddenMethods
parameters.description:
Allow to ignore methods tagged with @Override annotation
            (that usually mean inherited name).

parameters.name: ignoreStatic
parameters.description: Allow to skip variables with static modifier.

parameters.name: tokens
parameters.description: tokens to check

parameters.name: format
parameters.description: Specify valid identifiers.

parameters.name: ignoreModifier
parameters.description:
Control whether to ignore checking for the
              abstract modifier on classes that match the
              name.

parameters.name: ignoreName
parameters.description:
Control whether to ignore checking the name. Realistically
              only useful if using the check to identify that match name
              and do not have the abstract modifier.

parameters.name: allowSamelineMultipleAnnotations
parameters.description: To allow annotation(s) to be located on the same line as target element.

parameters.name: allowSamelineParameterizedAnnotation
parameters.description:
To allow one and only parameterized annotation to be located on the same line as
                target element.

parameters.name: allowSamelineSingleParameterlessAnnotation
parameters.description:
To allow single parameterless annotation to be located on the same line as
                target element.

parameters.name: tokens
parameters.description: tokens to check

parameters.name: tokens
parameters.description: tokens to check

parameters.name: closingParens
parameters.description: Defines the policy for ending parenthesis.

parameters.name: elementStyle
parameters.description: Defines the annotation element styles.

parameters.name: trailingArrayComma
parameters.description: Defines the policy for trailing comma in arrays.

parameters.name: max
parameters.description: maximum allowable number of lines

parameters.name: javaStyle
parameters.description: Controls whether to enforce Java style (true) or C style (false).

parameters.name: tagOrder
parameters.description: Specify the order by tags.

parameters.name: target
parameters.description: Specify the list of targets to check at-clauses.

parameters.name: violateExecutionOnNonTightHtml
parameters.description:
If turned on, will print violations if the Javadoc being examined by this check
              violates the tight html rules defined at
              Tight-HTML Rules.

parameters.name: allowByTailComment
parameters.description: Allow use escapes if trail comment is present.

parameters.name: allowEscapesForControlCharacters
parameters.description: Allow use escapes for non-printable(control) characters.

parameters.name: allowIfAllCharactersEscaped
parameters.description: Allow if all characters in literal are escaped.

parameters.name: allowNonPrintableEscapes
parameters.description: Allow non-printable escapes.

parameters.name: allowInSwitchCase
parameters.description: Allow nested blocks in case statements

parameters.name: allowClassImports
parameters.description:
whether to allow starred class imports like
              import java.util.*;.

parameters.name: allowStaticMemberImports
parameters.description:
whether to allow starred static member imports like
              import static org.junit.Assert.*;

parameters.name: excludes
parameters.description:
packages where star imports are allowed. Note that this property
              is not recursive, subpackages of excluded packages are not
              automatically excluded.

parameters.description: excludes

parameters.name: max
parameters.description:
the maximum allowed number of boolean operations in one
              expression.

Force grouping alphabetically, in

whether the number of tokens found should be calculated

Classes that should not be used as types in variable

parameters.name: file
parameters.description: file

parameters.name: path
parameters.description:
Regular expression of file paths to which this check should apply. Files that
              don't match the pattern will not be checked. The pattern will be matched against
              the full absolute file path.

parameters.name: caseSensitive
parameters.description:
whether string comparison should be case sensitive or not.
              Case sensitive sorting is in
              ASCII sort order.
              (It affects both type imports and static imports)

parameters.name: groups
parameters.description: groups

parameters.name: option
parameters.description: policy on the relative order between type imports and static imports

parameters.name: ordered
parameters.description:
whether type imports within each group should be sorted
              (It doesn't affect sorting for static imports.)

parameters.name: separated
parameters.description:
whether type import groups should be separated by, at least, one
              blank line or comment and aren't separated internally.
              (It doesn't affect separations for static imports.)

parameters.name: separatedStaticGroups
parameters.description: separatedStaticGroups

parameters.name: sortStaticImportsAlphabetically
parameters.description:
whether static imports located at top or bottom are sorted
                within the group.

parameters.name: staticGroups
parameters.description: staticGroups

parameters.name: tokens
parameters.description: tokens to check

parameters.name: useContainerOrderingForStatic
parameters.description: whether to use container ordering (Eclipse IDE term) for static imports or not

parameters.name: arrayInitIndent
parameters.description: how far an array initialisation should be indented when on next line

parameters.name: basicOffset
parameters.description: how far new indentation level should be indented when on the next line

parameters.name: braceAdjustment
parameters.description: how far a braces should be indented when on the next line

parameters.name: caseIndent
parameters.description: how far a case label should be indented when on next line

parameters.name: forceStrictCondition
parameters.description: forceStrictCondition

parameters.name: lineWrappingIndentation
parameters.description: how far continuation line should be indented when line-wrapping is present

parameters.name: throwsIndent
parameters.description: how far a throws clause should be indented when on next line

parameters.name: allowMarkerInterfaces
parameters.description:
Controls whether marker interfaces like Serializable are
              allowed.

parameters.name: violateImpliedAbstractMethod
parameters.description:
Control whether to enforce that abstract is explicitly coded
              on interface methods.

parameters.name: violateImpliedFinalField
parameters.description:
Control whether to enforce that final is explicitly coded
              on interface fields.

parameters.name: violateImpliedPublicField
parameters.description:
Control whether to enforce that public is explicitly coded
              on interface fields.

parameters.name: violateImpliedPublicMethod
parameters.description:
Control whether to enforce that public is explicitly coded
              on interface methods.

parameters.name: violateImpliedPublicNested
parameters.description:
Control whether to enforce that public is explicitly coded
              on interface nested types.

parameters.name: violateImpliedStaticField
parameters.description:
Control whether to enforce that static is explicitly coded
              on interface fields.

parameters.name: violateImpliedStaticNested
parameters.description:
Control whether to enforce that static is explicitly coded
              on interface nested types.

parameters.description:
the maximum allowed number of non commenting lines in a
              class.

parameters.description:
the maximum allowed number of non commenting lines in a
              file including all top level and nested classes.

parameters.name: methodMaximum
parameters.description:
the maximum allowed number of non commenting lines in a
              method.

parameters.name: allowMissingJavadoc
parameters.description: whether to ignore errors when a method javadoc is missed.

parameters.description:
whether to ignore errors when a method has parameters
            but does not have matching param tags in the javadoc.

parameters.name: allowMissingPropertyJavadoc
parameters.description: allowMissingPropertyJavadoc

parameters.name: allowMissingReturnTag
parameters.description:
whether to ignore errors when a method returns
            non-void type and does not have a return tag in the javadoc.

parameters.name: allowMissingThrowsTags
parameters.description:
whether to ignore errors when a method declares
            that it throws exceptions but does not have matching throws tags
            in the javadoc.

parameters.name: allowThrowsTagsForSubclasses
parameters.description:
whether to allow documented exceptions that
            are subclass of one of declared exception.

parameters.name: allowUndeclaredRTE
parameters.description:
whether to allow documented exceptions that
            are not declared if they are a subclass of java.lang.RuntimeException

parameters.description: List of annotations that could allow missed documentation.

parameters.description: Controls whether to apply the check to package-private member.

parameters.name: applyToPrivate
parameters.description: Controls whether to apply the check to private member.

parameters.name: applyToProtected
parameters.description: Controls whether to apply the check to protected member.

parameters.name: applyToPublic
parameters.description: Controls whether to apply the check to public member.

parameters.name: format
parameters.description: Specifies valid identifiers.

parameters.name: forbiddenSummaryFragments
parameters.description: forbidden summary fragments

parameters.name: period
parameters.description: period symbol at the end of first javadoc sentence

parameters.name: violateExecutionOnNonTightHtml
parameters.description:
If turned on, will print violations if the Javadoc being examined by this check
              violates the tight html rules defined at
              Tight-HTML Rules.

parameters.name: format
parameters.description:
The warnings property is a regex pattern.  Any warning
               being suppressed matching this pattern will be flagged.

parameters.name: tokens
parameters.description: tokens to check

parameters.name: aliasList
parameters.description:
Aliases for check names that can be used in code within
                SuppressWarnings

parameters.name: ignorePrivateMethods
parameters.description: whether private methods must be ignored

parameters.name: max
parameters.description: maximum allowed number of throws statements

parameters.name: format
parameters.description: Pattern to match comments against

parameters.name: format
parameters.description: pattern for strings allowed before the comment

parameters.name: legalComment
parameters.description:
pattern for text allowed in trailing comments. (This
                pattern will not be applied to multiline comments and the text of the
                comment will be trimmed before matching.)

parameters.name: baseName
parameters.description:
Base name of resource bundles which contain message resources. It helps
              the check to distinguish config and localization resources.

parameters.name: fileExtensions
parameters.description: fileExtensions

parameters.name: requiredTranslations
parameters.description: requiredTranslations

parameters.name: applyToPackage
parameters.description: Controls whether to apply the check to package-private member.

parameters.name: applyToPrivate
parameters.description: Controls whether to apply the check to private member.

parameters.name: applyToProtected
parameters.description: Controls whether to apply the check to protected member.

parameters.name: applyToPublic
parameters.description: Controls whether to apply the check to public member.

parameters.name: format
parameters.description: Specifies valid identifiers.

parameters.name: tokens
parameters.description: tokens to check

parameters.name: option
parameters.description: policy on how to pad parentheses

parameters.name: excludedClasses
parameters.description:
Pattern for qualified names of classes which are allowed
            to have a main method.

parameters.name: fileExtensions
parameters.description: file type extension of the files to check.

parameters.name: tokens
parameters.description: tokens to check

parameters.name: processJavadoc
parameters.description: whether to process Javadoc

parameters.name: allowedDistance
parameters.description:
A distance between declaration of variable and its first usage.
                Values should be greater than 0.

parameters.name: ignoreFinal
parameters.description: Allows to ignore variables with a 'final' modifier.

parameters.name: ignoreVariablePattern
parameters.description: pattern for ignoring the distance calculation

parameters.name: validateBetweenScopes
parameters.description:
Allows to calculate the distance between declaration of variable and its
                first usage in the different scopes.

parameters.name: allowPublicFinalFields
parameters.description: allows public final fields

parameters.name: allowPublicImmutableFields
parameters.description: allows immutable fields to be declared as public if defined in final class

parameters.name: ignoreAnnotationCanonicalNames
parameters.description: ignore annotations canonical names

parameters.name: immutableClassCanonicalNames
parameters.description: immutable classes canonical names

parameters.name: packageAllowed
parameters.description: whether package visible members are allowed

parameters.name: protectedAllowed
parameters.description: whether protected members are allowed

parameters.name: publicMemberPattern
parameters.description: pattern for public members that should be ignored

parameters.name: tokens
parameters.description: tokens to check

parameters.name: allowEmptyCatches
parameters.description: allow empty catch bodies

parameters.name: allowEmptyConstructors
parameters.description: allow empty constructor bodies

parameters.name: allowEmptyLambdas
parameters.description: allow empty lambda bodies

parameters.name: allowEmptyLoops
parameters.description: allow empty loop bodies

parameters.name: allowEmptyMethods
parameters.description: allow empty method bodies

parameters.name: allowEmptyTypes
parameters.description: allow empty class, interface and enum bodies

parameters.name: ignoreEnhancedForColon
parameters.description: ignore whitespace around colon in for-each loops

parameters.name: tokens
parameters.description: tokens to check

parameters.name: tag
parameters.description: Name of tag

parameters.name: tagFormat
parameters.description: Format of tag

parameters.name: tagSeverity
parameters.description: Severity level when tag is found and printed

parameters.description: tokens to check
